title: How to Make a Pimm's Cup

steps.headline: Fill a highball glass or mug halfway with ice cubes.
Measure and pour the Pimm's #1 in the glass, followed by the soda, club soda, or ginger ale.
Use a cocktail stirrer to stir the ingredients together.

text: Fill a highball glass or mug halfway with ice cubes.  Measure and pour the Pimm's #1 in the glass, followed by the soda, club soda, or ginger ale.  Use a cocktail stirrer to stir the ingredients together.  Garnish your drink with cucumbers.  Serve and enjoy.  Finished.
